r.s: Fast and Safe little cache system
r.d: This package is a little cache system optimized for file containers. It is fast and safe (because it uses file locking and/or anti-corruption tests).
r.n: New features : - Adding Cache_Lite_Function (to cache the result and output of functions/methods) Bugs fixed : - In a few cases of cache corruption, it was possible to get some warnings (but the output was correct) - Cache_Lite_Output require_once (to load Cache_Lite) wasn't correct
